description: Contributed to building and refining an internal admin dashboard, helping the business and sales teams access key client data and manage accounts more effectively, while collaborating in an Agile Scrum environment.
achievements: Improved operational efficiency by developing a professional, user-friendly admin dashboard
Reduced data fetch latency by ~57% (from ~700ms to ~300ms) via pagination, optimized queries, and API tuning
Designed and implemented secure authentication and session management using JWT and HTTP-only cookies
Collaborated in Agile Scrum with sprint planning, daily stand-ups, retrospectives, and Jira/GitHub tracking
